name: Revenge of the Redback Beta
description:
Protect your tribe from the invaders, use your environment to your advantage as you sneak around your enemies to kill them one after the other. But watch out, their deadly weapons won`t allow you to make any mistake!

This is the V00.3 beta for my FMP project Revenge of the Redback.  If you want to give some feedback, you can find the Google Doc here:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScj-bw2P9JfcMNvlMkBXIjlKCT08E3xy8BDbUwF...
